Introduction: Well hello there! I'm Gus, chef and owner of the Stardrop Saloon.#$e#Stop in if you need any refreshments. I've always got hot coffee and cold beer at the ready.$h
AcceptGift_(O)StardropTea: Oh wow, thank you! I'm tempted to drink all of it, but I'm going to save some for the saloon. I bet I could make an interesting cocktail with this!
AcceptGift_category_cooking: *sniff*... Ah. Exquisite cuisine. You know what I like, @.$h
accept_865: *sniff* sniff* ... that sharp smell!#$b#*slurp* *slurp* ... that zesty taste! That gritty texture!#$b#It can only be gourmet tomato salt! I'll trade you for it.
GreenRain: I saw the weather report last night. It really gave me a scare!$s#$e#Are there monsters out there? What's happening?
GreenRainFinished: I'm glad that's over. Running the saloon is enough to worry about, I don't need exotic weather in my life!
GreenRain_2: *sniff*... These rains have a particular smell. Have you noticed? Almost like freshly minced herbs...
cropMatured_256: Lewis tells me your tomatoes have ripened. That's great news!#$b#...Just imagine what the culinary world would be like without tomatoes...
eventSeen_502969: It's important to me that people can eat healthy, delicious meals. Unfortunately, in today's world, that's not so easy for everyone.
married: Hey @, just want to say that I'm happy for you and %spouse.
dating_Emily_memory_oneweek: Nayami has a real pep in her step lately... I wonder why? *wink*
divorced_once: Hey, I'm sorry to hear about the break-up...$s#$e#If you need company, you're always welcome at the Saloon.
divorced_twice: Another failed marriage? Well, it happens. Guess I'll be seeing you at the Saloon more often...$s
eventSeen_3206194: Hey, you really pulled through with those eggs. The omelet turned out great, thanks to you!
Resort_Entering: Hey, @! Glad you're here. I'm gonna be serving up some good stuff from behind the bar.
Resort: Meet me at the bar if you need a beverage.
IslandSouth_14_21: Hey, need a drink? I've got some special beverages that showcase local ingredients from this island.$h
willyCrabs: These might be the best crab cakes I've ever made...
Mon: Yeah, I know a lot about the people living here.#$e#That's one of the benefits of being a bartender.$h#$e#Sometimes I hear too much...
pamHouseUpgrade: Hey. I heard what you did for Pam. That was really really nice of you!$h#$e#Sadly, I don't think it will get her to cut back on the 'beverages'...
pamHouseUpgradeAnonymous: I saw Pam earlier today... she was grinning from ear to ear! She said someone bought her a new house!#$e#Whoever it was, they truly deserve the best!$h
Saloon: Welcome to the Stardrop Saloon! Can I get you anything?
Saloon4: Hi there, @. Make yourself at home.
SeedShop_Entry: Hi, Pierre!/Now, what do I need.../Ah, that looks good!/Makin' my special sauce tonight!/Pierre! What's fresh?/Pierre! Waddya got for me?
Saloon8: Hi there @. I'm glad to see you! You're always welcome here.
Saloon_Tue: Hi! Please relax and enjoy yourself.
Saloon_Thu: Hey, you look like you could use a beverage.
Saloon_Fri: Business has been really good tonight. I'm pleased.
Tue: I sell different dishes each week, so make sure and check in every now and then!#$e#You might taste something spectacular.$h#$e#Just let me know if you have any allergies.$s#$e#Okay, see you around.
Wed: Nayami's been working here for a while now. I don't know what I'd do without her!#$e#I would hate to have to clean all those pots by myself.$s
Thu: Pam and Clint come into the saloon almost every night.#$e#I'd probably go out of business if they stopped coming.$h#$e#So make sure you don't drive them away!
Thu6: Clint comes into the saloon almost every night and sits at the same table by himself.#$e#Sometimes he glances over at Nayami with a nervous look. Hmmm.#$e#Maybe that's why he comes in so often. Oh well, that means more business for me.
Thu8: Pam comes into the saloon almost every night and drinks way too much beer.#$e#Ah well, I shouldn't pass judgment on my customers.
Fri: Hi there, @. If you're ever thirsty, the Saloon is the place to be.
Fri4: I don't actually drink very much myself. I'm mainly doing this to make a living.#$e#Although I do enjoy a taste of the Stardew Valley vintage from time to time.
Sat: Are you much of a chef, @?#$e#If you have a kitchen and some recipes, you can cook some useful dishes.#$e#Home-cooked meals make great gifts, as well.
Sun: Business has been pretty steady thanks to my regular customers.
